name: Conversing Wind
text: This spell functions as whispering wind, except it can carry responses and doesn’t end after delivering its first message. After the wind completes its initial message, it waits for 1 round, then copies what it hear, and returns at the same speed and by the same route. It delivers what it heard to the location where the spell was originally cast. The wind continues back and forth in this way until the duration ends or the spell is dismissed.
text_zh:
该法术类似风讯术(whispering wind)，但该法术在传送完最初的信息后不会结束。在法术传递完最初的信息后，会在原地待1轮，记录该轮内所能听到的声音，然后按原速度原路径返回。并在施法地点放出那1轮内它所记录下的声音。之后继续记录1轮前往目的地。这股风会不断这样往返传递声音信息，直到时间结束。
